appearance.name: Page Appearance
appearance.description: With the new Scheduler components, most of these features will be available immediately for self-hosted deployments. Nylas-hosted implementations similar to v2 will be availabe in GA.

booking.name: Booking Options
booking.description: Booking settings, all available via API, with UI parity support via the Editor Component.

event.name: Event Options
event.description: Event settings, all available via API, with UI parity support via the Editor Component.

expire_after.name: Expiry Support
expire_after.description: The ability to make scheduling configurations (pages) that expire after your defined criteria.

features.name: Special Meeting types
features.description: Special meeting types that are exposed both via the API, and the Editor component.

reminders.name: Reminders
reminders.description: Support for email and webhook reminders.
